nodes.text: Escarte was a world located off the end of the Perlemian Trade Route where the Commerce Guild had major interests. Around the time of the Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic and Confederacy of Independent Systems, in which the Guild sided with the Confederacy, Escarte was placed under the protection of Diamond-class cruisers and Recusant-class light destroyers supported by Guild corvettes and bomber. The elite Escarte Guard, which served in the Guild's Punitive Security Forces, provided bodyguard service to important Guild personnel.

Escarte was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Rise of the Separatists, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars Roleplaying products. Escarte first appeared in the Star Wars Legends continuity in Labyrinth of Evil, a 2005 novel authored by James Luceno.
